news.title: Chris Mason: Reeves chooses to tax big and spend big
news.summary: In a Budget dogged by months of leaks, Labour hopes its big tax and spend plans pay off.

news.title: France to bring in form of military service, 25 years after conscription was phased out
news.summary: "The only way to avoid danger is to prepare for it," says President Emmanuel Macron.

news.title: Celebrity Traitors star Ruth Codd recovering after second leg amputation
news.summary: The actress is staying with family after an operation removed her leg below the knee, she said on TikTok.

news.title: Archaeologists make 'extraordinary discovery' in Orkney - but won't say what it is
news.summary: Archaeologists are to resume digging at the  site after 3D radar technology uncovered a mystery find.

news.title: How neighbours found out former marine drove into crowd in 'calculated act of violence'
news.summary: Before he ploughed his car into the parade, Paul Doyle was considered a steady, dependable family man.

news.title: US suspends immigration requests for Afghans after National Guard shooting
news.summary: The alleged gunman in the Washington shooting is an Afghan national who entered the US in September 2021.

news.title: Wales' most deprived areas named - see how your area is affected
news.summary: A neighbourhood in Rhyl has been named as the most deprived area of Wales in a new report.

news.title: Woman killed in shark attack at remote beach in Australian national park
news.summary: The woman died at the scene and a man was critically injured after the attack in New South Wales.

news.title: OBR calls in cyber expert over botched release of Budget analysis
news.summary: Rachel Reeves's statement was thrown into chaos after journalists were able to access the document early.

news.title: Nine ways the Budget could affect you if you're under 25
news.summary: The chancellor's Budget contained a slew of measures which will impact young people specifically.
